tool.name: GFF3 Feature Type Filter
tool.description: selects features from a gff3 file based on feature type
tool.help:
**What it does**
The tool finds the specified feature type(s) in an input GFF3 and will output **only** the specified feature type. By selecting the inversion, **everything except** the specified feature type(s) will be included in the output GFF3.
For example, user may output **only** ``Shine_Dalgarno_sequence`` type features, or, inverting that, output everything but ``Shine_Dalgarno_sequence`` type features. Any feature type used in the input GFF3 can be filtered; typical options would include gene, mRNA, CDS, tRNA, and terminator. The input name format must follow sequence ontology convention (http://www.sequenceontology.org/).
